rationale: 'More than 1.3 million' is a scale/metric. 'continues to take a toll' is a verb phrase. No intensifier/comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered on an Ohio egg farm as the bird flu continues to take a toll on the industry.

rationale: Contains containment verb 'slaughtered'. Q2 is overridden.
statement_text: More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered on an Ohio egg farm as the bird flu continues to take a toll on the industry.
